hero.heading: Every item in EcoDrop is a story of conscious consumption. Start it with us.

article1.heading: How to choose eco-products for your home and not make a mistake?
article1.txt: Eco-products are not only fashionable, but also really important. We tell you how to identify truly sustainable products.

article2.heading: What happens to the packaging after recycling?
article2.txt: We looked at how the recycling system works, which materials are actually recycled, and why the choice of packaging is so important.

article3.heading: 5 Habits That Will Make Your Life More Eco-Friendly
article3.txt: We'll tell you about five simple actions that you can implement today: from reusable bags to eco-friendly cleaning.
